text: Tyrese Gibson (born December 30, 1978) is an American R&B; singer, rapper, actor and model. He has acted in many movies and television series. These include Baby Boy (2001), 2 Fast 2 Furious and the Transformers movie series. In 2000, Gibson won the American Music Award for "Favorite New R&B;/Soul Artist". He has also been nominated for two Grammy Awards. title: Tyrese Gibson
